name: FlappySleigh
description:
This is just a little festive project that I created this and last Christmas. It began as a Flappy Bird Clone and has evolved quite a lot  since, with bullet-hell/shooter mechanics being added this year.

It's pretty janky and the art is crap but I enjoyed making it and I hope you can have some fun playing it.

If you get bored of 2021 I recommend playing 2022, as the levels are a lot more diverse visually and mechanically, and Santa gets an assault rifle.

I made everything except for the music, which while I know is royalty free I don't know where it came from, and I can't find out who made it. No-one will see this though and I can't make any money, so I'm not sure a lack of credit is too important.

If you can't use the Web Version, I've attached a Zip file.
